src:
Za petak, Jokićevih 13 [VIDEO]
01 Nov 2019, 09:31 by Nemanja
Košarkaši Denver Nagetsa poraženi su protekle večeri od ekipe Nju Orleans Pelikansa rezultatom 122:107.
Od samog starta susreta u ,,Smuti King centru“ Pelikansi su imali prednost, te je ispuštali u samo dva navrata u prvoj deonici. Nakon toga, usledila je dominacija ekipe iz Nju Orleansa, koja je u poslednjoj deonici imala prednost i od 22 poena. Njih je na ovoj utakmici predvodio Džalil Okafor sa 26 poena, dok je 25 postigrao Brendon Ingram.
U Nagetsima, kojima je ovo drugi poraz u sezoni, istakao se Majkl Porter Džunior sa 15 poena, a još šestorica košarkaša bila su dvocifrena, među kojima se našao i Nikola Jokić. Srpski centar je ubacio 13 poena, uz po šest skokova i asistencija.



Rolu večeri u tri odigrane utakmice NBA lige imao je Kavaj Lenard u pobedi Klipersa nad San Antonio Sparsima. Tesna utakmica na kraju je okončana trijumfom tima iz ,,grada anđela“, a najzaslužniji za to bio je svakako Lenard uz svojih 39 poena i 12 skokova. Pratio ga je Montrzel Harel sa 24. Demar Derozan se istakao na drugoj strani sa 29 koševa.




Atlanta Hoks – Majami Hit 97:106

Nju Orelans Pelikans – Denver Nagets 122:107

LA Klipers – San Antonio Spars 103:97


POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
For Friday, Jokic 13 [VIDEO]
01 Nov 2019, 09:31 by Nemanja
The Denver Nagets basketball players were defeated last night by the New Orleans Pelicans by a score of 122: 107.
From the very start of the match at the Smuti King Center, the Pelicans had the advantage, dropping it only two times in the first section. This was followed by the dominance of the New Orleans team, which had a 22-point advantage in the last stretch. They were led by Jalil Okafor with 26 points in the game, while Brendon Ingram scored 25.
In the Nagets, which is their second defeat of the season, Michael Porter Junior stood out with 15 points and six other basketball players were double digits, including Nikola Jokic. The Serbian center scored 13 points with six rebounds and assists.



The roll of the night in three NBA games played had Kavaj Lenard in the Clippers' win over the San Antonio Spars. The close game ended with the triumph of the team from the "City of Angels", and the most deserving of it was Lenard with his 39 points and 12 rebounds. He was followed by Montrzel Harel with 24. Demar Derozan stood out on the other side with 29 points.




Atlanta Hawks - Miami Hit 97: 106

New Orelans Pelicans - Denver Nagets 122: 107

LA Klipers - San Antonio Spars 103: 97
